name: Beach Watch
description:
Hey :)

This is my first gamejam. I worked on this game for 14 days, and I initially planned sooo much more features, but sadly I couldn't find any more time.

In this game you guard a beautiful sandy beach from the attacks of the evil...TRASH!! 

*ehm* The trash part might a bit misleading, afterall, some objects are literally household items in prestine condition! But they're NOT supposed to be in the ocean!?!

And it's your job to save the situation.

You need to pick up the trash by typing it's name and then rotate it correctly by again, typing the direction of where it should rotate.

But be quick! Every second is valuable, as your score decreases with time you spend  puzzling away with the trash.

Once 8PM hits and darkness halts the otherwise sunny beach, your job is done.

You'll be assigned a place at the prestigious 🎇 Beach Watch Leaderboard 🎇

So go on, stranger!  Go make the planet a better place :)

Assets used

Background music - Chill & Relaxing Lofi BGM | No Copyright - YouTube

GUI - GUI Pro Kit - Fantasy

Beach mesh from Fantasy Adventure Environment

Trash Bins - Plastc Trash Bins

Every mechanic in the game was coded from scratch.

1 Game round lasts 3 minutes, after that you get to see a result screen and your score is submitted to the  prestigious 🎇 Beach Watch Leaderboard 🎇

 - hexiy

ps. you can subscribe to my Youtube channel here , I plan on doing some game dev videos :) Thanks
